item.title: Jared Isaacman confirmed as next head of NASA
item.description: Isaacman will run the space agency at a time when Trump is trying to both downsize it and task it with returning astronauts to the Moon.

item.title: YouTube to pull music data from Billboard’s charts because it doesn’t like its ranking formula
item.description: YouTube takes its ball and goes home by pulling Billboard's access to its music data.

item.title: YouTube will stream the Oscars — exclusively — beginning in 2029
item.description: The news highlights YouTube's growing dominance in the television space and a major shift as streaming takes on more live events.

item.title: Meta is pausing its dream of sharing Quest’s Horizon OS with third-party headset makers
item.description: The company said that it would revisit opportunities for third-party partnerships in the future.

item.title: The Very Best Gifts for Dads of Christmas 2025
item.description: Dads are traditionally tough to shop for—let me help with these handpicked gift ideas for fathers with great taste.
